RhythmGenerator.title: Rhythm Generator
RhythmGenerator.subtitle: Explore mathematical patterns in musical rhythms

results.title: Top {{algorithm}} Pattern
results.noPattern: No pattern to display. Adjust the parameters above.

evenness.title: Evenness
evenness.text: Measures how evenly spaced the beats are around the circle. Perfect evenness means all gaps are equal.

entropy.title: Entropy
entropy.text: Measures the unpredictability of the rhythm. Higher entropy means more variety in gap lengths.

balance.title: Balance
balance.text: Measures how centered the pattern is. Balanced rhythms have their center of mass at the circle's center.

maxGap.title: Max Gap
maxGap.text: Minimizes the largest gap between beats. Higher scores mean no extremely long silences.

symmetry.title: Symmetry
symmetry.text: Checks if the pattern is palindromic (reads the same forwards and backwards).

Footer.title: QUANTONE
Footer.description: EXPLORING THE INTERSECTIONS OF MUSIC, MATHEMATICS, RHYTHMS, AND HARMONY

project.title: THE PROJECT
project.content: QUANTONE IS AN OPEN-SOURCE INITIATIVE THAT BRIDGES THE GAP BETWEEN MUSICAL EXPRESSION AND MATHEMATICAL PRECISION. WE BELIEVE THAT MUSIC IS FUNDAMENTALLY MATHEMATICAL, AND MATHEMATICS IS INHERENTLY MUSICAL. OUR MISSION IS TO MAKE THESE CONNECTIONS VISIBLE, TANGIBLE, AND ACCESSIBLE TO EVERYONE FROM MUSICIANS TO MATHEMATICIANS, FROM STUDENTS TO RESEARCHERS.
